name: Penguin Struggles
description:
Penguin Struggles - Play as a penguin, grow your horde, stay alive.

Objective:

You play as a penguin, your only goal in order to win the game is to grow your population to 8 penguins. You get one penguin for each 3 fishes collected. You also need to avoid enemies, they have a vision field, if you enter it, they will attack you. If you have penguins following you the enemies will kill your followers. However you can create a base for temporary amount  of time and then your penguins are invulnerable, however you become vulnerable. Once you have zero, penguins you don't loose the game immediately, you only loose the game if your individual health bar reaches zero.

Controls:

W, A, S, D or arrow keys to walk

'SPACE' to build a camp

Questionnaire:

Once you are done playtesting our game you can fill out a questionnaire for us:
